org.apache.juneau.rest.mock

Class MockServletResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.rest.mock.MockServletResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.ServletResponse

    public class MockServletResponse
extends Object
implements javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse
    An implementation of HttpServletResponse for mocking purposes.
    • Overview > juneau-rest-mock
